Injured on 5/17/1985 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 7 weeks...

Earned first career win on 5/14/1989...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Houston on 1/31/1993 (Going to HOU: 1B E. Martinez, P M. Perez, SS B. Larkin. Going to PIT: SS J. Valentin, 3B N. Nakamura, 1B A. Cabrera)...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/19/1994 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Houston in 1994...
Won World Series with Houston in 1995...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1997, winning 2 games with a 1.08 ERA...
